	pcomb -e 'and(a,b):if(a,b,a)' -e 'ypix=and(.01*ri(1)-bi(1),.01*gi(1)-bi(1))'  \
			-e 'ro=if(ypix,1,0);go=if(ypix,1,0);bo=0' input.hdr > output.hdr
